dialog.text: Sorry I missed you yesterday, I was feeling crap and just stayed in bed.  Mum offered my old room again, but Pete and I talked some more and I think things are going to be better.  How are you?

Douglas was asking me about my notes on the guest speakers this morning - like, what notes :blush: Luckily Jeff was a star and got off the hook.  Yet another thing I have failed to do!  Are you enjoying the guest speakers?

joins.text: At least one of us is, I've no idea what they are talking about most of the time.
Me neither, no idea what they are talking about most of the time.

dialog.text: I spent 3 hours on a bug this morning - completely wasted my morning and then Pete came home for lunch.  Will have to get back to it now - catch you Friday!
